roleset.name: suffering desmoplasia (growth of fibrous connective tissue)

example.text: Pure DM were defined as melanomas in which 90% of the invasive tumor was desmoplastic with a pauci-cellular fibrosing appearance.

roleset.note: DESMOPLASTIC-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to hyperplastic-j neoplastic-j dysplastic-j (from desmoplastic.01-j)
